snippet.title: Wizarre Release Date Trailer
snippet.description:
Have you ever dreamed of being a powerful wizard 🧙‍♂️, going on exciting adventures 🎍, and fighting in magic battles? ⚔️

💫 Welcome to Wizarre! 💫

Wizarre is a next-gen Wizard-themed blockchain game. Free to play with a built-in play-to-earn mechanism at your fingertips.

No requirements to play - anyone can join the fun!

🎮 Supported Devices: Play on both your mobile 📱 and computer 🖥️ 

Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2614360/Wizarre/
GooglePlay: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.FlyingCactus.Wizarre
Website: https://wizarre.io
Twitter: https://twitter.com/WizarreGame
Discord: https://discord.gg/86rzpbGcxQ
Telegram: https://t.me/WizarreGame
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/WizarreGame
